snippet.title: Arc Raiders Trials Guide - How To DOMINATE This Week's Trials (Final Week of 12/08)
snippet.description:
Raiders! Week 7, the final week of season 1 competitive Trials is here, and we’re breaking down every challenge so you can secure easy 3-star rankings and climb the leaderboards. From efficient wasp farming to mastering the matriach and maximizing your kills in Stella Montis, this guide gives you everything you need to push points solo or with a squad. Stay sharp, extract safely, and dominate this week’s Trials.

0:00 Intro
2:09 Trial 1 - Damage Ticks, Fireballs, and Pops
3:41 Trial 2 - Search Supply Drops
4:37 Trial 3 - Damage Wasps
5:49 Trial 4 - Damage Bastions
7:38 Trial 5 - Damage Queens or Matriarch
8:35 Subscribe For More ARC Raiders

*Our NEW 'Topside' Merch Is Now Available*

iPhone Case - https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPHvE6gLS6TcQ-qjfhs/
Poster - https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPHvE6s2A9S3R-W7g61/
